name: Dinner Rolls
steps: Heat beer to 110F-115F
Take off heat and add yeast, stir to consistency
Mix in Melted Butter, Sugar, Salt (fine), and Flour
Flour a surface and knead the dough for ~10 minutes
Coat an opaque bowl with Vegetable Oil
Put dough ball in bowl and turn once so top is coated w/ oil
Cover w/ tea towel and let rise for 1 hour
Punch down the dough and divide into 8 balls
For Traditional Shapes:
Roll each ball into 18" cylinders and twist into pretzely shapes
Bring Water and Baking Soda to a boil
Preheat Oven to 400F
Boil Pretzels for 30 seconds each (only a few at a time)
Drain on paper towels
Place with ample space on a greased baking sheet
Whisk Egg Yolk and Water, brush over each pretzel
Sprinkle on Salt (coarse) to taste
Bake for 10-12 minutes (Until golden/golden-brown)
For Pretzel Bites:
Roll each ball into 12" cylinders and cut each into 12 bites
Bring Water and Baking Soda to a boil
Preheat Oven to 425F
Boil Pretzels for 30 seconds each (only a few at a time)
Drain on paper towels
Place with ample space on a greased baking sheet
Whisk Egg Yolk and Water, brush over each pretzel
Sprinkle on Salt (coarse) to taste
Bake for 6-8 minutes (Until golden/golden-brown)
